Question
========

Of 9 subjects, before and after a given exertion of force, the heart rate is measured. We want to test whether the average heart rate before and after the effort is equal. Of the 9 differences between pre- and post-measurement the mean is 18 and the standard deviation is 32. The value of the test size of the paired T test is then

Answerlist
----------

* 1.69
* 2.13
* 3.15
* 3.48

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.69: Correct
* 2.13: Incorrect
* 3.15: Incorrect
* 3.48: Incorrect
